root.description: The root directory contains project metadata, configuration files, and the main entry points.

package.json.purpose: Defines project metadata, dependencies, scripts, and configuration settings.

README.md.purpose: Documentation file explaining the project setup and usage.

public.description: Contains static files such as the main HTML entry point, icons, and assets.

index.html.purpose: Root HTML file where the React app is mounted.

src.description: Contains all React-related source code, including components, pages, and assets.

components.description: Reusable UI components such as buttons, headers, and footers.

Navbar.js.migration_suggestion: Convert the navigation bar from index.html to a React component using JSX. Use React Router's Link component for navigation.
Navbar.js.routing_info: Use React Router's Link component for navigation links.

pages.description: Full-page components that represent different views of the application.

Home.js.migration_suggestion: Convert the HomeController and home.view.html to a functional component using React hooks for state management.
Home.js.routing_info: This component will be a route in the React Router setup.

Products.js.migration_suggestion: Convert the ProductsController and products.view.html to a functional component. Use hooks to fetch and manage product data.
Products.js.routing_info: This component will be a route in the React Router setup.

About.js.migration_suggestion: Convert the AboutController and about.view.html to a functional component using React hooks.
About.js.routing_info: This component will be a route in the React Router setup.

routes.description: Defines the routing structure of the application.

AppRoutes.js.migration_suggestion: Use React Router to define routes for Home, Products, and About pages. Implement a fallback route for unmatched URLs.
AppRoutes.js.routing_info: Handles all route definitions using React Router.

services.description: Handles API requests and business logic.

useProducts.js.migration_suggestion: Convert the productsService to a custom React hook that fetches product data.

styles.css.migration_suggestion: Migrate global styles to CSS modules or CSS-in-JS for component-specific styling.

project_structure.migration_suggestion: Create this file based on React best practices

package.json.migration_suggestion: Create this file based on React best practices

src/index.js.migration_suggestion: Create this file based on React best practices

src/App.js.migration_suggestion: Create this file based on React best practices
